nodes.text: Nojin Koolb was a male Human and the governor of Xartun during 7 ABY.

Shortly after the Bacta War, Nojin Koolb entered into an agreement with Warlord Zsinj for protection, despite Xartun being recent signatory to the New Republic. He assured Garik Loran, who was undercover pretending to be a subordinate of Zsinj, that his loyalty was to the warlord.
